rows.label: qst650513_msg0001
rows.name:
It would appear we are here.
This is the Ancient Wall which we were
to investigate.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0002
rows.name:
The land seems ravaged.
It's like some ancient battleground.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0003
rows.name: That is exactly what it is.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, to be honest, it's also a fairly
recent battleground.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0005
rows.name:
Indeed... Regrettably, one of the parties
responsible for that was my homeland,
the Superbian Empire.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0006
rows.name:
I assume from your tone,
you were against it?

rows.label: qst650513_msg0007
rows.name:
Completely.
Of course, in certain matters
conflict is simply unavoidable...

rows.label: qst650513_msg0008
rows.name: But this was not one of those matters.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0009
rows.name:
It was a foolish dispute to start,
made worse by fools who sought
to use it for their own benefit.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0011
rows.name: This world is much like mine, then.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0012
rows.name: Was it like that on Mira, too?

rows.label: qst650513_msg0013
rows.name:
Oh, our struggle for survival on Mira
is a simple thing in comparison.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0014
rows.name:
I was thinking of the rise and fall of
entire space-faring civilizations in the
more distant past of my universe...

rows.label: qst650513_msg0015
rows.name:
A clash between two great forces in
the near vicinity of Earth space...
That conflict was foolish in the utmost.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0016
rows.name:
I do not comprehend every nuance of
meaning in your words, yet the depth of
desolation behind them is clear as day.

rows.label: qst650513_msg0017
rows.name:
For my part, small though it may be,
I wish to quell what senseless conflict
is within my means to quell.
